text: Wolfgang "Teddy" de Beer (2 January 1964 â€“ 30 December 2024) was a German professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for MSV Duisburg and Borussia Dortmund. His career lasted from 1981 to 2001. He managed Borussia Dortmund from 2001 to 2024. De Beer died on 30 December 2024, three days before his 61st birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Wolfgang de Beer
